          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gravitational pull of planets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gravitationszugkraft der Planeten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gravitation des planètes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tração gravitacional dos planetas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrazione gravitazionale dei pianeti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βαρύτητας τράβηγμα των πλανητών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gravitación de planetas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure illustrates the direction of the gravitational pull of planets, Uranus and Neptune, on each other as they orbit around the Sun.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neptune</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">uranus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational pull</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung veranschaulicht die Richtung der 
Gravitationszugkraft der Planeten, Uranus und Neptun, auf einander, 
während sie um die Sonne in Umlauf bringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure illustre la direction de la gravitation
des planètes, Uranus et Neptune, sur l'un l'autre pendant qu'elles 
orbitent autour du soleil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura ilustra o sentido da tração 
gravitacional dos planetas, Uranus e Netuno, em se enquanto orbitam em
torno do sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura illustra il senso della attrazione 
gravitazionale dei pianeti, Uranus e Nettuno, su a vicenda mentre 
orbitano intorno a intorno al sole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός επεξηγεί την κατεύθυνση του βαρύτητας 
τραβήγματος των πλανητών, Ουρανός και Ποσειδώνας, ο ένας στον 
άλλο όπως βάζουν σε τροχιά γύρω από τον ήλιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura ilustra la dirección de la 
gravitación de los planetas, Uranus y Neptuno, en uno a mientras que 
se mueven en órbita alrededor alrededor del sol.</string>
          </description>
